title: GOLD-THE BEST OF SPANDAU BALLET 2009 CD+DVD IN mp3 320k+COVS BY
description:
In the days when boy bands played their own instruments, Spandau Ballet--a bunch of pretty boys from north London with kilts, shoulder pads, bad 1980s hair, eyeliner and unmistakable good looks--caused quite a stir and soon had both major record labels and teenage girls monitoring their every move. Major-league players among the New Romantic movement, the five piece lived the high life and churned out hit after hit between 1980 and 1986. This compilation features pretty much all of their offerings ("Gold", "True", "Lifeline", "Highly Strung")--some more memorable than others. Gold's sleeve notesmoreÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¦ boldly proclaim "...this is where it all began.
